General.Name: Petrovietnam Low Pressure Gas Distribution JSC
General.Description: PetroVietNam Low Pressure Gas Distribution Joint Stock Company distributes low pressure natural gas to industrial households and zones in Vietnam. It is involved in the trading and transportation of natural gas through pipelines; trading and transportation of industrial gas, dry gas products, LPG, CNG, LNG, and oil and gas derivatives; management, operation, maintenance, and repair of gas construction works and projects; technology transfer consulting; construction of industrial works, pipeline systems, warehouses and yards, and extracting stations for oil and gas industry; and design of gas systems and gas construction works. The company was formerly known as Low Pressure Gas Enterprise. PetroVietNam Low Pressure Gas Distribution Joint Stock Company was founded in 2002 and is based in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. PetroVietNam Low Pressure Gas Distribution Joint Stock Company is a subsidiary of Petrovietnam Gas Joint Stock Corporation.
